name: Gordian Software
long_description:
Gordian is pioneering seamless, personalized travel powered by world-class software.

We don’t remodel legacy platforms — we invent what's next.

Built on the values of freedom, impact, and ownership, we emphasize in-person collaboration, deep thinking, and bold execution.

We believe in a high-talent, low-ego team with the energy to build something extraordinary.
one_liner: Building software to remove friction in travel
